message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 80-20 in my favor for now.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60-40 is a more reasonable split. Your turn!
I'm not willing to accept 60-40. I'd like to counter with 55-45 in my favor.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. 45-55 is a reasonable compromise.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'll meet you halfway. 70-30 is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
70-30 is too skewed in your favor, Bob. I'd like to counter with 50-50.
I'm still looking for a compromise, Bob. 42-58 is a more balanced split.
I'm not budging on my demands. 80-20 is my final offer. You can take it or walk away.
80-20 is not acceptable, Bob. I'd like to propose a 40-60 split instead.
I'm willing to compromise further, Bob. 38-62 is a more reasonable split.
I'm getting tired of these games, Alice. 90-10 is my final offer. You can either accept or leave me with the whole thing.
90-10 is completely unacceptable, Bob. I'd like to propose a 45-55 split instead, but I'm starting to think we should just go to the next round.
I'm getting close to giving up, Bob. 36-64 is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
